channel.title: Good iPad 4th Retina Display apps?
channel.description: Just got an iPad which I'll be using mostly for school work, maybe some programming if possible, and of course I'll put some games on there. Does anyone have some good apps to suggest? I can suggest Notability for taking notes, very advanced and useful.

item.title: Good iPad 4th Retina Display apps?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Just got an iPad which I’ll be using mostly for school work, maybe some programming if possible, and of course I’ll put some games on there. Does anyone have some good apps to suggest? I can suggest Notability for taking notes, very advanced and useful.
